name: RainMan
0:
”Alexa, ask Rain Man if I need a raincoat today”
”ask Rain Man if it's going to rain”
”ask Rain Man if I need an umbrella”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain man
des: Rain Man checks if it is going to rain near you and tells you if you need a raincoat briefly. Rain Man knows you don't have time to waste so responds "Nope" when it won't rain and "Yes, you do" when it will.
